backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the Valentine SPA project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend components, hooks, styling files, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode, base styles, and utility applications.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ValentinePage.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Renders animated floating heart emojis positioned across the screen.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartB: Displays animated burst hearts at specified screen coordinates.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveLe: Popup dialog showing a love letter with close controls.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Propos: Interactive proposal card with YES/NO buttons and moving NO behavior.
frontend/src/components/valentine/QuoteB: Simple styled block containing a romantic quote.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reason: Card that shows a random reason for love when the button is clicked.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Relati: Displays a live-updating timer showing relationship duration.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Secret: Dialog revealing a secret message once unlocked.
Card with password input that unlocks the secret message dialog.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Reusable card wrapper applying shared Valentine-themed styling.
Footer with Valentine messages and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
Header with title, subtitle, and clickable heart triggering animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeartBurst.ts: Manages heart burst animations by generating timed floating heart items.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity loading using Dfinity AuthClient.
Computes and updates a live timer since a fixed 2022-08-01 start date.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base plus custom Valentine-themed styles, colors, animations, and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Assembles the full Valentine-themed page with cards, dialogs, timers, and heart burst interactions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and requirements for the Valentine SPA.
